description: This sumptuous lamb recipe features a leg of lamb coated in a sticky maple and mustard glaze, served with black grapes and feta cheese.
keywords: Roast lamb,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,Grape,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Autumn,Apr 2021,Peanut free
name: Maple-Glazed Lamb with Black Grapes & Feta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup maple syrup (1 tbs reserved for dressing)
200g seedless black grapes, cut into small bunches (to serve)
200g Greek-style feta, halved crossways, thinly sliced (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220째C/200째C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Place a wire rack over tray.
Using a small, sharp knife, make 8 small pockets in lamb. Press 1 garlic clove into each pocket. Place lamb on wire rack.
Meanwhile, reserve 1 tbs syrup. Combine mustard and remaining syrup in a small bowl. Season.

Bake lamb for 30 minutes. Reduce oven to 180째C/160째C fan-forced. Pour over half the syrup mixture, then bake for a further 1 hour, pouring remaining syrup mixture over lamb for the last 10 minutes of cooking, for medium or until cooked to your liking. Transfer lamb to a large plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, place vinegar, oil and reserved syrup in a small bowl. Whisk with a fork to combine.
Transfer lamb to a large board. Arrange grapes and feta on a large plate and top with mint. Serve with lamb, dressing and lemon wedges.
